titleStmt.title: Truth vindicated, or, A detection of the aspersions and scandals cast upon Sir Robert Clayton and Sir George Treby, Justices, and Slingsby Bethell and Henry Cornish, Esquires, sheriffs of the city of London, in a paper published in the name of Dr. Francis Hawkins, minister of the Tower, intituled, The confession of Edward Fitz-Harris, Esq., &c. the coppy of which paper is herewith printed for the readers clearer judgment in the case.
titleStmt.author: Treby, George, Sir, 1644?-1700.
Fitzharris, Edward, 1648?-1681. Confession.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Sir George Treby. Cf. DNB.
"The confession of Edward Fitz-harys, Esq.": p. 33-38.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
